attributes.action: Vote To stop All immigration for a period of 10 years and not allow other EU residents access to Either Uk Benefits or Housing.
attributes.additional_details:
At the last census it showed that 4 towns no longer have a white majority.The continued mass immigration from overseas and the open access to EU nations cannot continue.
Our whole culture and way of life is being changed.

By putting a ban for 10 years and stopping access to benefits for the same period will allow the White majority better access to work and houusing.
